corpus_positioning.headline: The Industry's Most Validated Energy Efficiency Dataset

industry_comparison.key_difference: Energy Star certifies equipment with 2 lab tests. This corpus has 254 PE-certified field measurements with independent ML validation.

labs.name: UL (Underwriters Laboratories)
labs.significance: Verified entire testing procedure, not just results

professional_engineers.significance: PE certification is legally binding - engineers stake professional licenses on accuracy

ml_validation_summary.key_insight: Zero human bias - algorithm-driven proof. Pre-treatment systems ran erratically; post-treatment became highly predictable.
ml_validation_summary.implication: ML algorithms found that treated systems behave predictably while untreated systems are chaotic - this is independent validation of treatment efficacy

ashrae_research.finding: Documented oil fouling as 7% Year 1 + 5% Year 2 + 2% per year thereafter
ashrae_research.significance: Establishes the problem this technology solves

ashrae_research.finding: 33% heat transfer reduction at 1-2% oil concentration
ashrae_research.significance: Quantifies efficiency loss from oil fouling
